mapper.select: SELECT tp.paper_seq, tp.title, tp.like_cnt, IFNULL(tpt.user_cnt, 0) AS user_cnt, IFNULL(tpt.create_date, tp.create_date) AS create_date, tu.nick_name FROM tb_paper tp LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT paper_seq, IFNULL(COUNT(text_write_seq), 0) AS user_cnt, create_date FROM tb_paper_text GROUP BY paper_seq, create_date ORDER BY create_date DESC ) tpt ON tp.paper_seq = tpt.paper_seq LEFT JOIN tb_user tu ON tp.create_user_seq = tu.user_seq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_paper ( title, create_user_seq, create_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{createUserSeq}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO tb_paper_text ( paper_seq, paper_text, create_user_seq, create_date ) VALUES ( #{paperSeq}, #{paperText}, #{createUserSeq}, NOW() )
